data.eml:eml: A new species of the mesopelagic isopod genus Xenuraega Tattersall, 1909 (Crustacea: Isopoda: Aegidae) from Japan, the second species in the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shimomura, Michitaka, Bruce, Niel L. (2019): A new species of the mesopelagic isopod genus Xenuraega Tattersall, 1909 (Crustacea: Isopoda: Aegidae) from Japan, the second species in the genus. Zootaxa 4683 (3): 431-438, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4683.3.7
